sentence.text: Tumor-specific methylation changes at IGF2 DMR2 were observed in 59% of cancer patients, IGF2 DMR0 in 38%, DIRAS3 DMR in 36%, GRB10 ICR in 23%, negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II DMR in 21%, mesoderm development ICR in 19%, H19 ICR in 18%, KvDMR in 8% and SNRPN/SNURF ICR in 4%.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
